title: Forecast of nickel consumption worldwide 2015 to 2020
summary: In general Consumption in thousand metric tons has rose over the Year.
Consumption in thousand metric tons is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2020.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum Consumption in thousand metric tons, about 2376.0 was reported at Year 2020
The lowest Consumption in thousand metric tons, of value 2117.0 was reported at Year 2017
min_summary: Overall Consumption in thousand metric tons has increased over the Year.
Consumption in thousand metric tons is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2020.
